PerfectNetExp.abs: orbed 圆满的, orbed 扁圆形的, orbed 圆的
orbed 扁圆形的, orbed 被包围着的, orbed 球形的
orbed 十全的, orbed 圆满的, orbed 圆形的

list.abs: the orb moves arc-when it appears , it'll first travel upwards a bit ( while maintaining whatever horizontal velocity it has ) , and then slow down and turn around back down .这个球呈抛物线移动-当它出现时，它会先上升一点（同时保持其水平移动速度)，接着减速并且变成下落。
数圆蛛(orb weaver)一样，常进行修补，而不每天重新结网。 园蛛科的一属。
oraviczite 杂镁铝硅石orb texture 球粒状结构orb 球；天体；轨道；使形成球体
为什么加冰封球(Frozen Orb)和冰系掌握(Cold Mastery)? 1.10的技能协同系统让女巫的技能点十分紧张。

auth_sentence.content: Two large tears orbed themselves beneath the Professor's lids.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two large tears orbed themselves beneath the Professor's lids.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two large tears orbed themselves beneath the Professor's lids.

auth_sentence.content: Let each...gripe fast his orbed Shield.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Let each...gripe fast his orbed Shield.

auth_sentence.content: Full thirty times hath Phoebus' cart gone round Neptune's salt wash and Tellus' orbed ground.
auth_sentence.res_content: Full thirty times hath Phoebus' cart gone round Neptune's salt wash and Tellus' orbed ground.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Full thirty times hath Phoebus' cart gone round Neptune's salt wash and Tellus' orbed ground.
